other_tests.findings: velocities were 13 to 18 m/second in all extremities, consistent with a childhood demyelinating pattern
demonstrated homozygosity for the NM_000157.2:c.1448T/H11022 C (L444P) mutation in the glucocerebrosidase gene and homozygosity for the NM_000530.4:c.263C/H11022 T (S78L) allele of MPZ
